creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund and gift of Robert T. Coffland in memory of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: hand-drawn and block printed, resist and mordant dyed, handspun and woven cotton; floral and leaf forms or forested landscape; dark turquoise blue, rust red, tan, purple (turquoise and red mixed/one color on top of the other); border of circles with leaves and circles inside, squares with quatrefoils, zigzags, and circles; white machine stitching (initials?) along long side with border design
title: Textile panel
